data.meta_site_name: Charles Mann Obituary | January 12, 2021 | Hanneman Family Funeral Homes & Crematory - Liberty Center, OH
data.text:
Charles "Sonny" B. Mann Sr. 86, passed away on January 12, 2021 in Holiday, Florida. Born and raised in Dungannon; moved to Ohio, then after retiring, moved to Florida. He still calls Dungannon home.

He is proceeded in death by a brother (Robert), his mother (Rosa Baldwin) and wife (DeEtta).

He has four surviving sons: Charles Jr. (Jasper, TX.), James "Mike" and (Sharon) Defiance, OH., Byron and (Lori) Westerville, OH., Estest, Defiance, OH. Sister, Peggy Howell, Defiance, OH.

several grandchildren, cousins, nieces and nephews and lots of friends, who all will truly miss him.

He loved the outdoors, hunting and especially fishing (salt water). enjoyed his fruit trees and gardening. He was also an amateur photographer, always taking pictures.

Services will be held on Wednesday, January 20, 2021 from 1:00 â€“ 1:45 PM at Hanneman Funeral Home, 302 E. Maple Street, Liberty Center, Ohio. Internment will immediately follow in Youngs Cemetery (next to his wife).

A memorial service is being planned for later this year at his home in Virginia.
